item.title: Nuvama Wealth Q3 FY26: Flat Quarter Amid Rising Costs Pressures Margins
item.description: Nuvama Wealth Management Ltd. reported a marginal decline in consolidated net profit for Q3 FY26 (Oct-Dec'25), posting ₹253.80 crores compared to ₹254.13 crores in Q2 FY26, representing a sequential decline of 0.13%. Year-on-year growth remained subdued at 0.67%, significantly below the company's historical growth trajectory. The stock has struggled recently, trading at ₹1,359.00 as of January 23, 2026, down 7.84% over the past week and 12.08% over six months, reflecting investor concerns about the company's ability to sustain its premium valuation amid flattening earnings momentum. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: DB (International) Stock Brokers Q3 FY26: Revenue Decline Continues as Brokerage Volumes Remain Subdued
item.description: DB (International) Stock Brokers Ltd., a micro-cap capital markets player with a market capitalisation of ₹88.00 crores, reported a net profit of ₹0.89 crores for Q3 FY26 (October-December 2025), marking a sequential decline of 9.18% from Q2 FY26 and a year-on-year contraction of 13.59%. The stock, currently trading at ₹24.80, has remained flat in the latest trading session but continues to struggle significantly below its 52-week high of ₹44.00, down 43.64% from that peak. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Ashish Polyplast Q3 FY26: Margin Recovery Masks Revenue Decline Concerns
item.description: Ashish Polyplast Ltd., a micro-cap manufacturer of premium braided hoses and flexible PVC pipes, reported a return to profitability in Q3 FY26 with net profit of ₹0.15 crores, reversing a loss of ₹0.07 crores in the previous quarter. However, the ₹13.00-crore market capitalisation company continues to grapple with declining revenues, with sales falling 20.81% year-on-year to ₹3.54 crores, raising questions about the sustainability of its operational recovery. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Bloom Dekor Q3 FY26: Deepening Losses Raise Viability Concerns
item.description: Bloom Dekor Ltd., an Ahmedabad-based manufacturer and exporter of high-pressure decorative laminates, reported a significant deterioration in its Q3 FY26 financial performance, posting a net loss of ₹0.51 crores compared to a loss of ₹0.32 crores in Q3 FY25. The micro-cap company, with a market capitalisation of just ₹8.00 crores, saw revenues plunge 46.43% quarter-on-quarter to ₹0.60 crores whilst operating margins collapsed to -98.33%, marking the worst quarterly performance in recent history. Following the results, the stock trades at ₹11.99, down marginally by 0.08% from the previous close. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Advani Hotels Q3 FY26: Luxury Resort Operator Delivers Strong Quarter Despite Sector Headwinds
item.description: Advani Hotels & Resorts (India) Ltd., operator of the 5-star deluxe Caravela Beach Resort in South Goa, has posted robust financial performance in Q3 FY26, though the stock continues to face headwinds with shares trading at ₹61.85, down 2.78% over the past year. The micro-cap hospitality player, with a market capitalisation of ₹559 crores, demonstrated operational strength during the peak tourist season, even as technical indicators remain mixed and the stock trades at a significant discount to its 52-week high of ₹69.00. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Bluestone Jewellery & Lifestyle Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Bluestone Jewellery & Lifestyle Ltd's Q3 FY26 results are positive, showing a 45.76% sequential sales growth and a net profit of ₹69.08 crores, marking a significant turnaround. However, ongoing challenges such as high debt levels and profitability sustainability concerns remain. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Go Digit General Insurance Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Go Digit General Insurance Ltd's latest results show strong net sales growth of 10.42% year-on-year, but a slight decline in net profit by 1.97% from the previous quarter, indicating challenges in profitability despite revenue gains. Investors should watch for the company's ability to improve margins and sustain growth moving forward. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Premier Energies Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Premier Energies Ltd's Q3 FY26 results are strong, with a 13.02% year-on-year revenue increase and a 53.48% rise in net profit, reflecting effective operational performance. However, the stock has declined, indicating a disconnect between financial results and market sentiment, suggesting caution for investors. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Le Travenues Technology Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Le Travenues Technology Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth and a significant recovery in profitability, but challenges remain with operating margins and return on equity. Overall, while the performance is positive, the company needs to improve capital efficiency to enhance shareholder value. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Forbes Precision Tools & Machine Parts Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Forbes Precision Tools & Machine Parts Ltd's latest results show a concerning decline in net profit by 32.66% quarter-on-quarter, despite a modest revenue growth of 1.74%. The company faces operational challenges, particularly with rising employee costs impacting profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Krystal Integrated Services Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Krystal Integrated Services Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net profit decline of nearly 20% quarter-on-quarter and a decrease in operating margins, despite some year-on-year revenue growth. The company faces challenges with revenue volatility and cash flow, indicating a need for improved stability and margin recovery. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Machhar Industries Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Machhar Industries Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a significant rebound in net profit and revenue, with net sales up 14.33% quarter-on-quarter and a net profit increase of 1,350%. However, the company faces long-term challenges, including low return on equity and historical operational inefficiencies, raising concerns about its sustainability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Innova Captab Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Innova Captab Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with a net profit of ₹42.15 crores, but operational margins are under pressure due to rising costs and increased interest expenses, indicating mixed financial health that requires careful monitoring. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Ideaforge Technology Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Ideaforge Technology Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹33.85 crores and a significant decline in revenue from the previous quarter, despite a year-on-year growth of 79.16%. The company's operational challenges and negative returns raise doubts about its financial sustainability moving forward. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Nuvama Wealth Management Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Nuvama Wealth Management Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 7.75% year-on-year, but profitability has declined, with net profit down 1.36% year-on-year due to rising operational costs. Overall, while revenue performance is solid, profitability challenges indicate competitive pressures in the industry. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are BEML Land Assets Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: BEML Land Assets Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹0.46 crores and ongoing operational losses with no revenue generated. The company's financial health is deteriorating, with significant erosion of shareholder funds and a lack of clear plans for future profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Aditya Birla Sun Life AMC Ltd's Q3 FY26 results are strong, with a 7.41% increase in net sales and a 20.07% rise in net profit year-on-year, reflecting solid operational fundamentals. However, mixed investor sentiment and recent stock underperformance suggest caution in the market. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Paras Defence and Space Technologies Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Paras Defence and Space Technologies Ltd's latest results show strong year-on-year revenue growth of 23.99%, but a sequential decline in net profit by 11.77% and margin compression indicate operational challenges that need to be addressed. Overall, while the company is growing, concerns about profitability and cost management persist. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are EKI Energy Services Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: EKI Energy Services Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a 75.50% year-on-year decline in net sales and a net loss of ₹2.16 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and a negative return on equity. Despite some liquidity strength, the company faces critical issues in its business model and revenue sustainability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Alivus Life Sciences Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Alivus Life Sciences Ltd's latest results are strong, featuring record quarterly revenue of ₹672.89 crores and improved operating margins, but the company faces market challenges and long-term growth concerns as its stock trades below its 52-week high. Time: 1 hour ago
